citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1100 on
06/25/2014.
Inspector knocked on the door, no one answered. Called cell phone, spoke with licensee who stated that they were
out of town and could not do inspection today.
Additional Inspectors
Neis Cynthia, Compliance Specialist
Maxwell Kelly, Animal Care Inspector
